resource.name: Northern Region Patient profile
resource.description: Represents Patient data exposed through the Northern Region APIs. The profile extends the NZ Base profile

resource.description: If true, then indicates that the patient as authorized the use of this address or telecom to contact them.

resource.description: The name of a building cited in an address.

resource.description: New Zealand citizenship

resource.name: NZ Ethnicity
resource.description:
The ethnic group or groups that a person identifies with or feels they belong to.  Ethnicity is a measure of cultural affiliation as opposed to race, ancestry, nationality or citizen.  Ethnicity is self-perceived and a person can belong to more than one group.

The Stats New Zealand standard can be found [here](http://aria.stats.govt.nz/aria/#ClassificationView:uri=http://stats.govt.nz/cms/ClassificationVersion/YVqOcFHSlguKkT17).

resource.name: Sex At Birth
resource.description: A person’s sex at the time of their birth (considered to be immutable).

resource.name: NZ Suburb
resource.description: Suburb element of a NZ Address.

resource.name: ValidatedByPatient
resource.description: If true, then indicates that the patient as indicated that the data is correct. Defined by healthAlliance
